name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager // Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
type_line: Legendary Creature — Elder Dragon // Legendary Planeswalker — Bolas

card_faces.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager
card_faces.oracle_text:
Flying
When Nicol Bolas enters, each opponent discards a card.
{4}{U}{B}{R}: Exile Nicol Bolas, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. Activate only as a sorcery.

card_faces.name: Nicol Bolas, the Arisen
card_faces.oracle_text:
+2: Draw two cards.
−3: Nicol Bolas deals 10 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
−4: Put target creature or planeswalker card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
−12: Exile all but the bottom card of target player's library.

all_parts.name: Nicol Bolas, the Ravager // Nicol Bolas, the Arisen

name: Karlov of the Ghost Council
oracle_text:
Whenever you gain life, put two +1/+1 counters on Karlov.
{W}{B}, Remove six +1/+1 counters from Karlov: Exile target creature.
flavor_text: "Those who say money can't buy happiness clearly don't have enough."

name: Morophon, the Boundless
oracle_text:
Changeling (This card is every creature type.)
As Morophon enters, choose a creature type.
Spells of the chosen type you cast cost {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} less to cast. This effect reduces only the amount of colored mana you pay.
Other creatures you control of the chosen type get +1/+1.

name: Grand Arbiter Augustin IV
oracle_text:
White spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Blue spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
Spells your opponents cast cost {1} more to cast.
flavor_text: "A great leader must have the wisdom to know what's right and the courage to make it so."

name: Ezuri, Claw of Progress
oracle_text:
Whenever a creature you control with power 2 or less enters, you get an experience counter.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, put X +1/+1 counters on another target creature you control, where X is the number of experience counters you have.

name: Edgar Markov
oracle_text:
Eminence — Whenever you cast another Vampire spell, if Edgar is in the command zone or on the battlefield, create a 1/1 black Vampire creature token.
First strike, haste
Whenever Edgar attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each Vampire you control.

name: K'rrik, Son of Yawgmoth
oracle_text:
({B/P} can be paid with either {B} or 2 life.)
Lifelink
For each {B} in a cost, you may pay 2 life rather than pay that mana.
Whenever you cast a black spell, put a +1/+1 counter on K'rrik.

name: The Gitrog Monster
oracle_text:
Deathtouch
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice The Gitrog Monster unless you sacrifice a land.
You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
Whenever one or more land cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, draw a card.

name: Zacama, Primal Calamity
oracle_text:
Vigilance, reach, trample
When Zacama enters, if you cast it, untap all lands you control.
{2}{R}: Zacama deals 3 damage to target creature.
{2}{G}: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
{2}{W}: You gain 3 life.

name: Mizzix of the Izmagnus
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value greater than the number of experience counters you have, you get an experience counter.
Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast for each experience counter you have.
